mapper.select:
select
from fs_like left join fs_article on fs_like.article_id = fs_article.id where fs_like.state = 1 and fs_like.like_user = #{likeUser} and fs_article.state = 1 order by fs_like.id desc

select
from fs_like left join fs_article on fs_like.article_id = fs_article.id where fs_like.state = 1 and fs_article.state = 1 and fs_like.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
